posts.title: Converting to TypeScript from React JS
posts.summary: I recently started to convert my React JS project to TypeScript. I wanted to share my journey in converting my project and the steps I took to get started. Here I cover a few key concepts when you convert a React JS project to TypeScript.

posts.title: How to type the setState function from the useState hook
posts.author: Dale Larroder
posts.summary: A deep dive into how to properly type a setState function from the useState hook.
